attributes.action: Sack Alistair Darling for the Child Benefit Data fiasco, and halt ID Cards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government should take more responsibility for the safety of people's private information. The fiasco surrounding the loss of 25 million records underlines the 'do as I say, not as I do mentality'. ID Cards? what happens then is when all that data gets lost? Vote now for no confidence in Alistair Darling, Vote now for no ID cards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
